abstract: Xstrata said on Monday it was still in deal talks with Companhia Vale do Rio Doce of Brazil after reporting that its profit more than tripled for the year, helped by the $18 billion acquisition of Falconbridge and by ravenous emerging-markets demand for metals.
lead_paragraph: Xstrata said on Monday it was still in deal talks with Companhia Vale do Rio Doce of Brazil after reporting that its profit more than tripled for the year, helped by the $18 billion acquisition of Falconbridge and by ravenous emerging-markets demand for metals.
